text: The 17th British Independent Film Awards were held on 7 December 2014 in London. The awards honoured the best British independent films of 2014. ==Awards== ===Best British Independent Film=== *Pride *'71 *Calvary *Mr. Turner *The Imitation Game ===Best Director=== *Yann Demange -
